content.rendered:
FOSS4G-Asia 2023 is set to take place in Seoul from November 28th to December 2nd, 2023. This conference brings together developers, users, managers, and decision-makers from around the world who are interested in open source geospatial software. It serves as a platform for discussing new directions, exciting implementations, and emerging business opportunities in the field.

This year’s FOSS4G-Asia is particularly special for participants as it will be held as part of Seoul GeoWeek. From November 28th to December 2nd, FOSS4G-Asia, Seoul Geospatial Forum, Korea Spatial Information Society’s Fall Meeting, and UN-HABITAT’s UTC (Urban Thinkers Campus) will all be hosted at the same venue as part of Seoul GeoWeek. This provides a unique opportunity for participants to connect and network with like-minded geospatial professionals from diverse backgrounds in one location.

The FOSS4G-Asia Seoul team cordially invites you to consider sponsoring this exceptional conference. Your contribution will play a crucial role in ensuring the success and inclusivity of FOSS4G-Asia. Part of the sponsorship funds will be allocated to the TGP (Travel Grant Program), benefiting attendees in need of financial assistance. Additionally, you will have the opportunity to promote your organization to geospatial leaders not only from Korea and Asia, but also from around the globe. We offer six different sponsorship packages, each designed to provide various levels of support for the event. The available sponsoring packages are as follows:
